item.title: D3_events_OUTCOMESIM_simple
item.description: Metadata Data Model Parameters Example {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"medatata_name":["Name of the dataset","Content of the dataset","Unit of observation","Dataset where the list of UoOs is fully listed and with 1 record per UoO","How many observations per UoO","Variables capturing the UoO","Primary key","Parameters",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null],"metadata_content":["D3_events_OUTCOMESIM_simple","contains the outcomes observed in the study population, including negative outcomes but excluding covid and complex algorithms","a person in the study population D4_study_population","D4_study_population","as many as the observed outcomes, starting 365 days before study_entry_date, = 0"

item.title: D3_covid_episodes

Each episode is separated from the next by at least 60 days","a person in the study population D4_study_population"

item.title: D3_covid_severity_components_hospitalisation
item.description:
Metadata Data Model Parameters Examples {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"medatata_name":["Name of the dataset","Content of the dataset","Unit of observation","Dataset where the list of UoOs is fully listed and with 1 record per UoO","How many observations per UoO","Variables capturing the UoO","Primary key","Parameters",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null],"metadata_content":["D3_covid_severity_components_hospitalisation","contains the episodes of COVID in D3_covid_episodes that had level of severity "hospitalised"","a covid episode","D3_covid_episodes","1","person_id date","person_id date",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null]},"columns":[{"id":"medatata_name","name":"medatata_name","type":"character"},{"id":"metadata_content","name":"metadata_content","type":"character"}],"sortable":false,"searchable":true,"pagination":false,"highlight":true,"bordered":true,"striped":true,"style":{"maxWidth":1800},"height":"600px","dataKey":"78f3b4a78f23c1a99ab840e276ee0055"},"children":[]},"class":"reactR_markup"},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"VarName":["person_id","date","component",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null],"Description":["unique person identifier",null,"whether the component component contributed to detect this case as hospitalised
there are 3 groups of components, and whether one coponent contributes or not depends on the choice of the DAP if the datasource
1) covid_narrow_hosp_m_meaning, with meaning depending on which meanings are available in EVENTS: this means that the case was found in a hospitalisation with a covid diagnosis
2 hospitalisation_after_COVID: in some data sources (eg, pediatric), any hospitalisation within 14 days after a covid diagnosis is detected as due to covid
3) hospitalisation_from_covid_registry: in some data sources a covid registry is available that records whether the case is hospitalised"

item.title: D3_covid_severity_components_ICU
item.description:
Metadata Data Model Parameters Examples {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"medatata_name":["Name of the dataset","Content of the dataset","Unit of observation","Dataset where the list of UoOs is fully listed and with 1 record per UoO","How many observations per UoO","Variables capturing the UoO","Primary key","Parameters",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null],"metadata_content":["D3_covid_severity_components_ICU","contains the episodes of COVID in D3_covid_episodes that had level of severity "intensive care unit (ICU)"","a covid episode","D3_covid_episodes","1","person_id date","person_id date",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null]},"columns":[{"id":"medatata_name","name":"medatata_name","type":"character"},{"id":"metadata_content","name":"metadata_content","type":"character"}],"sortable":false,"searchable":true,"pagination":false,"highlight":true,"bordered":true,"striped":true,"style":{"maxWidth":1800},"height":"600px","dataKey":"84af04abdbfe1e7d46a4a9095818cf7d"},"children":[]},"class":"reactR_markup"},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"VarName":["person_id","date","component",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null],"Description":["unique person identifier",null,"whether the component component contributed to detect this case as needing intensive care unit (ICU)
there are 5 groups of components, and whether one coponent contributes or not depends on the choice of the DAP if the datasource
1) dia_ARDS_m_narrow_meaning and dia_ARDS_m_possible_meaning, with meaning depending on which meanings are available in EVENTS: this means that the case was found with a acut respiratory distress diagnosis (narrow or possible) within 14 days after a covid episode
2 mech_ventilation_m_meaning: in some data sources procedures of mechanical ventilation can be recorded; if this hapens within 14 days after a covid episode, the episode is labeled as with ICU
3) covid_narrow_ICU_m_meaning: 
4) extracted_from_free_text:
5) ICU_from_covid_registry: in some data sources a covid registry is available that records whether the case is treated in ICU"

item.title: D3_covid_severity_components_death
item.description:
Metadata Data Model Parameters Examples {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"medatata_name":["Name of the dataset","Content of the dataset","Unit of observation","Dataset where the list of UoOs is fully listed and with 1 record per UoO","How many observations per UoO","Variables capturing the UoO","Primary key","Parameters",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null],"metadata_content":["D3_covid_severity_components_death","contains the episodes of COVID in D3_covid_episodes that had level of severity "death"","a covid episode","D3_covid_episodes","1","person_id date","person_id date",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null]},"columns":[{"id":"medatata_name","name":"medatata_name","type":"character"},{"id":"metadata_content","name":"metadata_content","type":"character"}],"sortable":false,"searchable":true,"pagination":false,"highlight":true,"bordered":true,"striped":true,"style":{"maxWidth":1800},"height":"600px","dataKey":"0ad759fe86ac5dc8a06e6d2888ae5c14"},"children":[]},"class":"reactR_markup"},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"VarName":["person_id","date","component",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null],"Description":["unique person identifier",null,"whether the component component contributed to detect this case as fatal
here are 2 components, and whether one coponent contributes or not depends on the choice of the DAP if the datasource
1) death_within_56_days, this means that the person died within 56 after the case was detected
2) death_from_covid_registry: in some data sources a covid registry is available that records whether the case was fatal"

Occurrences are recorde with their level of severity. The date is the date of the first information about the infection, infromation about seeviry may accrue across time"
